thread.title: Royals fan surprises girlfriend with proposal, they surprise the
thread.title_full: Royals fan surprises girlfriend with proposal, they surprise the - KCTV5

author: Donovan Pimentel, Digital producer
title: Royals fan surprises girlfriend with proposal, they surprise the
text:
KANSAS CITY, MO (KCTV) - Friday's Royals game is extra special for one couple who started the day with a surprise proposal and will end it cheering for their team inside the K.
The couple hasn't told their families yet. Instead, they want to surprise them with a sign.
The front of the sign reads, "Our family doesn't know but ..."
Then the back side says, "October 23rd (Today) I said yes!!! Yes! Yes!"
Nic Defreece surprised his girlfriend Jennifer Stapleton who works at the Kauffman Center for the Performing Arts. Her favorite spot is the Helzberg Hall.
With some help from her coworkers, he got her inside the hall and started playing their song.
That's when he popped the question.
“I got down and I just said, ‘Can I spend the rest of my life with you?’ And then bam (brings out ring),” Defreece said. 
She said yes!
“I'm really happy because I love this man so much! I love his family and I love his daughter,” said Stapleton.
KCTV5 wants to thank the couple for letting us share their big announcement.
